sentences.en: A couple of mobsters were rubbed out in a fracas with the law.
sentences.cn: 几个暴徒在与警方喧闹的斗争中丧命.

sentences.en: Distracted and embattled itself , the White House has barely paid attention to the fracas.
sentences.cn: 自己都心烦意乱疲于布阵的白宫对这次的纷争也无暇顾及.

sentences.en: Eight people were injured in the fracas.
EXAMPLE : The fracas in the conference room disturbed the work of employees nearby.
sentences.cn: 会议室的喧闹打扰了旁边员工的工作.

sentences.en: How to set up and execute FRACAS with product teams and manage reliability growth?
sentences.cn: 如何与产品团队一起建立并实施FRACAS并管理可靠性的增长?

sentences.en: The police were called in to break up ( ie stop ) the fracas.
The police were called in to stop the fracas.
This fracas was at the end of the 1995 Rugby World Cup.
sentences.cn: 上述争吵发生于1995年橄榄球世界杯(RugbyWorldCup)即将结束之际.

sentences.en: Workflow technology was employed for controlling the FRACAS workflow.
sentences.cn: 采用工作流技术来控制fracas流程,实现了流程可定制性.

trans.tran_en: a short noisy fight involving several peo ple
